Class CalendarDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • CalendarDriver

  • public class CalendarDriver
extends java.lang.Object

    CalendarDriver Class

    Contains an instance "year" of the CalendarYear Class Contains an instance "curDay" of the CalendarDay class Contains the instance "curMonth" of the CalendarMonth class

    See Also:
    CalendarYear, CalendarDay, CalendarMonth

      • addRecurringEvent

        public void addRecurringEvent(java.lang.String text,
                              java.lang.String frequency,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> daysOfWeek,
                              int startTime,
                              int endTime)
        add recurring events on a Monthly, Bi-Weekly, and weekly basis
        Parameters:
        text - - the text to add to an event
        frequency - - the recurrence of an event ex "Monthly"
        daysOfWeek - - array of the days of the week an event should repeat on
        startTime - - The event start time
        endTime - - The end time of the event
